The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the do not realize that they are going to be feeding the bodies of their missing members and capturing the women for themselves. It's a straight forward creature feature and under the name Timothy Long this film was released as Love Love.
It's hard to tell what the bad guys want. Nothing makes sense with the romance angle.
